comments.body: Could you raise an issue on the source repo asking them to add a license file and include it in the `MANIFEST.in` and then copy a link to that issue here?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +45,49 @@about:
  home: https://github.com/Deepwalker/aldjemy/
  license: BSD
  license_family: BSD
  # To be added https://github.com/Deepwalker/aldjemy/pull/50
